about_the_game:
After many years of living in the hustle and bustle of the city, you decide to take a radical step – moving to the countryside. It turns out that you've inherited an old farm that has been in your family for generations. Intrigued by the possibility of change, you leave your current life behind and embark on a journey to the countryside.

Upon arriving, you discover that the farm needs a lot of work to restore it to its former glory. While searching through the old house, you come across an ancient gardening book. It turns out to be a family journal, where knowledge of cultivating rare vegetable varieties has been recorded for generations.

DIG


Dig and loosen the soil to prepare the ideal conditions for your plants to grow. Pay attention to the soil quality, its moisture, and nutrient content – all of which affect the health of your vegetables.

GROW


Grow a wide range of vegetables, from traditional to rare and unique varieties. Plant directly in the ground or in pots, buy ready-made seedlings, or create your own from rare and trusted varieties.

LEARN


Learn to recognize the needs of your vegetables, adjusting fertilization, watering, and protection according to their specific requirements. Face the challenges posed by pests and plant diseases. Use natural protection methods and organic products to safeguard your crops.

CARE


Each plant requires unique care. Prune, train shoots, tie them with strings, and build supports to ensure optimal growth and higher yields.

SELLING


Harvest your crops and sell them to local shops and supermarkets that value the quality and freshness of your products. Accept orders, build relationships with buyers, and negotiate prices.

PROGRESS


Invest the money you earn into developing your farm. Buy new tools, expand your fields, and build additional greenhouses and irrigation systems. Everything has its specific use and will help you tailor conditions to the needs of your plants.

name: Market Gardener

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 780
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 3.4 GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 12 GB available space

short_description: Market Gardener is a gardening simulator where you choose to move to the countryside and start a new life as a farmer. Cultivate a wide range of vegetables, from traditional to rare and unique varieties. Immerse yourself in the peaceful yet challenging world of small-scale farming.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
